agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Judiciary & Civil Jurisprudence TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, May 6, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jeff Leach SB 1426 Zaffirini Relating to the establishment by a county of public guardians for certain incapacitated persons and funding for guardianships by public guardians and related services. SB 1975 Zaffirini Relating to probate and guardianship matters and proceedings and other matters involving probate courts. SB 1491 Perry Relating to civil liability of a nursing facility resident's responsible payor for misappropriation of the resident's funds. SB 1575 Alvarado | et al. Relating to governmental immunity for and adjudication of claims arising from a local governmental entity's disaster recovery contract. SB 1784 Zaffirini Relating to the deduction from applied income of compensation paid to guardians of certain Medicaid recipients. Bills deleted after last posting: SB 1370 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
